localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: DataTorch is a platform for building datasets and experimenting with machine learning algorithms. Organize and annotate data across multiple cloud storages, automate tasks with agents and pipelines, and share your models and data with the wider community!
blogPost.body: DataTorch is a platform for building datasets and experimenting with machine learning algorithms. Organize and annotate data across multiple cloud storages, automate tasks with agents and pipelines, and share your models and data with the wider community!
blogPost.title: DataTorch - Build and share datasets to experiment with ML
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: DataTorch是一个用于构建数据集和实验机器学习算法的平台。在多个云存储中组织和注释数据，利用代理和管道自动执行任务，并与更广泛的社区分享您的模型和数据！您可以在云存储中组织和注释数据，利用代理和管道自动执行任务，并与更广泛的社区分享您的模型和数据。
localize.tagline: 建立和共享数据集，以实验ML。

localize.description: DataTorch是一個用於構建數據集和實驗機器學習算法的平臺。在多個雲存儲中組織和註釋數據，利用代理和管道自動執行任務，並與更廣泛的社區分享您的模型和數據！您可以在雲存儲中組織和註釋數據，利用代理和管道自動執行任務，並與更廣泛的社區分享您的模型和數據。
localize.tagline: 建立和共享數據集，以實驗ML。
